publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3188 Angela Constance: Musically Active Dudes (Musac)—That the Parliament recognises the success of Musically Active Dudes (Musac) in securing £9,675 from the Lotto Awards for All and applauds its work with its members, who all have learning or physical disabilities, by providing them with opportunities for creative release through voice coaching, instrument playing and movement to music.

S3M-3188 Musically Active Dudes (Musac) (lodged on 7 January 2009) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jamie Hepburn*, Aileen Campbell*, Stuart McMillan*, Alex Neil*, Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*, Christina McKelvie*, Trish Godman*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Patricia Ferguson*

S3M-3188 Angela Constance: Musically Active Dudes (Musac)—That the Parliament recognises the success of Musically Active Dudes (Musac) in securing £9,675 from the Lotto Awards for All and applauds its work with its members, who all have learning or physical disabilities, by providing them with opportunities for creative release through voice coaching, instrument playing and movement to music. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Jamie Hepburn, Aileen Campbell, Stuart McMillan, Alex Neil, Alasdair Allan, Robin Harper, Christina McKelvie, Trish Godman, Bashir Ahmad, Bill Kidd, Patricia Ferguson, Sandra White*
S3M-3188 Musically Active Dudes (Musac) (lodged on 7 January 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3188 Musically Active Dudes (Musac) (lodged on 7 January 2009) Tom McCabe*
